attribs.name: marquee
attribs.current:
Clan Tremere of the Camarilla descends from Tremere of the Third Generation, who diablerized and usurped Saulot, childe of Enoch
the Wise, childe of Caine the First.  Thus Clan Tremere replaced Clan Salubri as one of the thirteen Great Clans, and hunted them to
extinction. Warlocks and blood sorcerers, the once-mighty Tremere recently suffered a devastating blow from the Second Inquisition.

attribs.name: bp_slaketext
attribs.current:
Animals & bagged blood slake full Hunger.
Humans slake full Hunger.
Must kill to reduce Hunger below 1.

attribs.name: bane_text
attribs.current: Your Brujah Blood simmers with barely contained rage, exploding at the slightest provocation. Subtract dice equal to your Bane Severity (1) from any roll to resist fury frenzy. This cannot take the pool below one die.

attribs.name: repeating_advantage_-LON80J-KjrFbAX1Z3Qs_advantage_details
attribs.current: The baroness values your coterie quite highly, but her support is unreliable: The duties of her office demand much of her time, not to mention how difficult it can be to contact her given her frequent relocations and security precautions.

attribs.name: repeating_negadvantage_-LON84dh7hKaOiTtyHVD_negadvantage_details
attribs.current: Frederik Scheer, elder of Clan Tremere and Camarilla seneschal of Toronto, has not ceded any part of his city to the Anarchs.  The erosion of Camarilla power has only intensified his fervor: Toronto will remain the Camarilla stronghold it always has been, whatever it takes.  Unfortunately for you, his attentions are firmly fixed on your coterie --- not only are you the baroness' most prized with two of her childer among its members, but your recent activities have proven to be a thorn in Scheer's side one too many times.

attribs.name: repeating_desire_-LOWnFLPe9tiFyXdIvUO_desire
attribs.current: Break into a place with pure physical force. (Break off a lock by squeezing it off, kick down a door, punch some bricks, I don't care, but it must feel powerful)

attribs.name: mask
attribs.current:
My Mortal Identity, no relevant authority is aware I died as I was only gone for a week and even actively announced I would be gone in advance for friends, family, and coworkers. The advantages of a planned embrace. 

If you'd like I could invent some fake (but real for the character) numbers like SIN, Bank Account, etc., but I suspect that is overkill?

attribs.name: domain_haven
attribs.current: I don't know Toronto. A decent apartment inside the domain lines?

attribs.name: assets_carried
attribs.current:
Keyring: FEO-K1 (Most common type of elevator key), C415A and CH751 (Most common types of filing cabinet keys), 1391Z and 91333 (The keys for the highway and city patrol cars for Toronto, although not the smart cars for parking. No, seriously, they all use the same key, I'm not joking. Look up the 1284X for an even more hilarious version of this, as it will unlock most police cars AND taxis in the states), Lock Jigglers, Wire Loops (just a paperclip with the insulation melted off the end. Can be used to short circuits, great for opening doors with electronic keypads.), 16120 (Key for every single Door King telephony box produced and used. This will get you into most apartments and deparment store back rooms. Basically anywhere you can think of that would have a buzzer to get in or require an access code.), 222343 (Linear key, the second most common box like the Door King variety. Same principle. I kid you not when I say about 60% of all places using boxes will use one of these types.), Handcuff key (This will also open all police handcuffs. No seriously, all.)

Sling Pack: Laptop running Kali Linux with option for a Windows boot.  Raspberry Pis that phone home, reverse proxy out to establish persistence (You plug these in to a physical port on the network and have home servers running listeners. These will basically run through every option available and then call out, letting you act as if physically on the network in question, even from a distance.), Nexus 7 with Kali nethunter. Add OTG cable with wireless adapter which lets you do packet injection and wifi hacks, Rtfm: Red Team Field Manual, Letter opener – used as shim to open doors, Plastic shims made from dollar store plastic folder – used to open doors, Proxmark 3 used to clone RFID badges, Alfa Network Wi-Fi USB Antenna used to sniff packets, USB wireless antenna with atheros chipset, used for packet injection
bump keys, lockpicks, 2x leatherman multitools, multi head screwdriver, pens + paper, low lumen small flashlight to put in mouth or on hat, USB cables, Ethernet cables, Mini Wireless Keyboard with Mouse Touchpad, Hak5 USB Rubber Ducky(https://hakshop.com/collections/physical-access/products/usb-rubber-ducky-deluxe), Hak5 LAN Tap, SD cards, USB drives, OTG USB cable
The Glitch (USB drive with a program that downloads an executable, runs it in memory, grabs an lsass memory dump, uploads that memory dump somewhere) USB keylogger, PS2 keylogger, Ubertooth (Bluetooth Sniffer), USB drive with Katana, USB switchblade, WiFi Pineapple, A network hub used to bypass NAC
Wireless router – plug it into port, turn it on, and leave. Then try to get to it from the parking lot, Extra battery packs for phone/laptop, A second flashlight, GoPro – to watch key locations from phone

In Pockets: High Quality Cell, Tactical Knife, Wallet, Pepper Spray,

attribs.name: assets_vehicles
attribs.current:
Motorcycle and Luxury Sedan. Because who hasn't wanted to live their rich bad-boy dreams? I know I certainly have, and so I shall. Fuck brands, they don't matter. You can imagine it from a description, more than that is a waste.

In Vehicle: Get-Home Bag, Vehicle Repair Kit, Shovel, Tarp, Work Gloves, Leather Gloves, Change of Clothes, Shotgun, 2 boxes of shells, Road Flares, Rope, Salt, Sledgehammer, Tire Iron, Spare Tire,

attribs.name: assets_stashed
attribs.current:
Grab-Bag: Spax, Machete, Mace and Pepper Spray, Crowbar, Fire-Ax, Shovel Handgun with two spare clips, Stormproof Matches, 2x Zippo Lighters, Kevlar Work Gloves, Ear Plugs, Safety Goggles, Tube Tent, Emergency Blanket, Poncho, Paracord – 50 feet, Duct Tape – 50 feet, 10 Large Zip Ties, Emergency Radio, Emergency Whistle, Ammonia Inhalants, LED Flashlight, Multi-Plier, 6 AA and 6 AAA batteries, $1000 in small bills. 

Bug-Out Binder containing copies of: Birth certificate., SIN card, Driver's license, Passport, Medical records including blood type, health insurance information, diplomas, school transcripts, weapon permits, credit and debit card (front and back), deed to house, vehicle ownership papers, vehicle insurance and registration, emergency contact info to Maxwell Floyd and the Coterie, an Attorney, and my Bank. Lastly a list of valuables to include Firearm serial numbers, valuable jewelry, valuable electronics, and Antiques and family heirlooms

attribs.name: ambition
attribs.current: To enjoy the feeling of the sun again, at least once.

attribs.name: domain_personal
attribs.current: I want to fill all this out, but I swear to god I can't find where the details went, I'm sorry.

attribs.name: repeating_beliefs_-LN8C-7tYi1WzDuktgvo_touchstone_details
attribs.current: A Police Detective and close friend to Kingston's family A good man with a good heart. While he is somewhat cynical and jaded in appearance, he does try and be a good person and do good things, and he was honestly a great man to look up to in place of King's own father. Right now life is harder on him than ever before, with family issues cropping up, multiple instance of police corruption coming to light with the Camarilla absences and at least a dozen mysterious disappearances with almost no-evidence. (Ghouls aging out as some of the elders fleeing can no longer sustain them, or something)

attribs.name: repeating_beliefs_-LN8C4JXQgk98vIaseny_touchstone_details
attribs.current:
In the past, Jason was a notorious bully and the star quarterback of his high school's football team. Most likely due to this, Jason's grades were lacking and didn't seem to be much of a priority to him, as, according to his father, he was hoping for a football scholarship.

In addition, Jason also ran a shoplifting operation with his girlfriend Rene and his friend Nick, and he also took prescription drugs, of which Nick often stole for him from Jason's mother. Also,  Jason often took part in illegal underground cage fights, which would have been where he died if it hadn't been for Kingston stepping in to call off that particular bout. 

The remnants of Jason's past still linger, and he hasn't really left his old life behind much, but he has potential as a fighter, and Kingston personally would like to see him grow into a better human being. He's made Jason into sort of a "humanitarian" project, hoping helping him can help himself.

attribs.name: repeating_beliefs_-LN8CAbRc8nbwCr6hzKM_touchstone_details
attribs.current:
an ex-convict and long time street dweller who loves to saranade with advice and ocassional music. He's often seen at the park playing chess or music, and he's almost never without something burning in his mouth. Some days are worse than others, and Gardner doesn't always imbibe the best things for himself. In truth king suspects he might have some mental illnesses, but at least for now he's mostly sane, lucid, and eager to impart advice for a sandwich, a smoke, a story or a game. 

Perpetually cheerful when he's not raving, if he ever seems to take on a serious caste, it's cause for concern, as either the subject matter is extremely important, or he's having an episode. Or he's messing with you, but that's not TOO common.

attribs.name: domain_hunt
attribs.current: Again, I don't know Toronto. But I do know Vampire Fetish Clubs are a very real thing, so I imagine going to one of those to feed from people with their consent would work well. Also sex. Lots and lots of sex with biting. He asks permission first, of course, but c'mon, he's seductive. At least more than average. Slightly

attribs.name: mortal_history
attribs.current:
Mother worked for health service on the nurses hotline, father was a blue collar plumber. They separated when he was young and his mother ended up getting into a series of bad relationships that Kingston insists have nothing to do with the anger issues he feels. They might, they might not, it's unclear, but he does hate his mother more than basically any other person on the planet. She is a verbally abusive and mentally unstable person who should not have been allowed to raise kids. He has a half sister on his mothers side from an ill-advised relationship. She has since cleaned up and stopped drinking and doing drugs but is still impossible to deal with, passive-aggressive and verbally abusive all in one while constantly lamenting her lot in life as she heaps the abuse on you. It's all about respect with her despite her never showing any to anyone in return, and of course she constantly runs into drama in her own life despite wanting to "avoid drama." Everyone on the planet is either the best person ever or a total bitch/asshole. 

His father is a relatively calm man with strong political opinions in opposition to his own, although that is really their only point of conflict and strive now that Kingston has moved out of his place and is out of school. Before that point Kingston's habitual truancy was a major point of conflict and even ended up ruining one of Kingston's father's relationships. His father is still single to this day. Kingston now tries to support him in retirement and enjoys hanging out with him, watching MMA or Football and having some beer, or in Kingston's case, wine. They avoid political topics as best they can, but even if they do get into it they've learned to drop it quickly now. Often they end up in long conversations of a philosophical nature, which his father hates, a historical nature (especially about world war 1 and 2), which Kingston would enjoy more if only the topics were more varied so he didn't feel like a total idiot all the time, or about legal topics, usually the state of governance and laws in general as opposed to specific politicians, as that is considered safe territory. 

All of Kingston's Grandparents except for his Grandmother on his mothers side have died of cancer, and his Aunt on his father's side almost did the same with breast cancer. He has three cousins, Brenna, Connor and Rick that he used to see a lot and get along with but for reasons he doesn't really understand they'd grown apart in the past several years before his embrace, and he hasn't really bothered to get back in touch. Kingston doesn't place a lot of value on familial loyalty and obligation just because they are family. There has to be something more to it for him, and as such he's always been closer to his father and friends than anyone else, and has never felt an urge to connect with any of his other relatives, especially his half-sister who he has mostly just abandoned to his abusive mother's care. He can't really tell you why he feels so jaded about the whole situation, but he does. If pressed he will admit that it does bother him when he thinks about it, but he thinks about it rarely and is easily able to distract himself from the topic before he feels any urge to do anything about it.

 Kingston actually went to the trouble of legally changing his last name from his mother's, Hamill, to his father's, Black. Not only does he think it's a much cooler name, but he generally only gets along with his father and wishes he could never have to interact with his mother again. Although he does like his Grandmother alright, so that's off the table. 

Kingston's youth involved a lot of time not attending school in the early years because he would get into fights constantly. He was still relatively intelligent and was never held back for his performance, although he was never the student he could be, which was a perpetual source of disappointment for his family. He used to be a competent musician too, performing in one of the top high-school musical bands in his state, but he lost interest after he dropped out of school in favor of a GED and has never bothered to pick it back up. He did eventually go back and take upgrading courses at a local community college so he could have an official and full high school diploma, but that's about the extent of it. Mostly he's self-taught on a variety of topics, enjoying to read books and internet articles about anything that happens to catch his interest in the moment and generally pursuing them to a greater degree than most people do. 

After high school he didn't really do much different either. He did some drugs, he drank a little, and then he got a job in construction, using his father as an in. That's how he met Max, or more accurately, a ghouled friend of Max's who eventually introduced them. Cue a vitae addiction, missing work, disappointment from his father who then cuts him off, and a generally hellish lifestyle for a while until Max steps in as a surrogate figure rather than just a dealer, having seen something in the broken, or perhaps blank, slate that was now Kingston. He helped mold and model him for the embrace from that point, and Kingston really got his life back together, although he was angrier than ever and hoping to take it out *somewhere*. Cue the fight club as an operation for Max. Once Kingston was able to prove that was going well, the embrace was just a waiting game.

attribs.name: mortal_ambition
attribs.current: Look after my father and make him proud.

attribs.name: repeating_others_-LOeoUR-93ZPXxziiyRx_kr_otherdetails
attribs.current: Daughter of Jessica Hamill and Rony Dietterlie, Half-sister to Kingston Black. Younger by 10 years.

attribs.name: repeating_others_-LOeohtuSyA5Bgdlc7xX_kr_otherdetails
attribs.current: Father of his half-sister. A likeable enough guy in short doses. If it weren't for his association with his mother, Kingston would almost certianly be closer friends with him, much like his sister. As is Kingston still probably sees him once or twice a month and is more than happy to chat. A somewhat overweight owner of a long-haul trucking company, he inherited it from his own father, Sam. Used to have serious drug and alcohol problems, but now he is a very functional middle-aged man who may like beer a little overmuch, but still within the socially acceptable bounds, although not the healthy ones.

attribs.name: repeating_friends_-LOepLM-EirVPr2EhZOX_kr_frienddetails
attribs.current: Ghoul of Max Floyd's and semi-friend of King's. He's been a ghoul for almost twenty years now, but he hasn't really matured much because he hasn't needed to. He doesn't really want to be a vampire though, as he mostly enjoys the benefits of ghouldom having no real cost overall. He's just a better human.
